title: Season 1
description: The beginning of a legend. A prodigious talent, Xiao Yan, suddenly loses his powers, becoming the shame of his clan. With the help of a mysterious spirit in his ring, he begins his arduous journey to reclaim his strength and honor.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.description: Meet Xiao Yan, a fallen genius. Three years after losing his powers, he faces a humiliating engagement annulment from Nalan Yanran of the Misty Cloud Sect.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.description: In his despair, Xiao Yan discovers the spirit of a master alchemist, Yao Lao, residing in his mother's ring. Yao Lao reveals the secret behind his lost power.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.description: Under Yao Lao's tutelage, Xiao Yan begins his harsh training to become an alchemist and regain his Dou Qi, starting with building his foundation.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.description: Xiao Yan travels to the Magic Beast Mountain Range to find ingredients for Yao Lao's foundation-building elixir and gain real combat experience.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.description: He encounters the 'Little Fairy Doctor' and gets entangled in a hunt for a treasure map, facing off against the Wolf Head Mercenary Group.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.description: Xiao Yan successfully refines the foundation elixir. The painful process of absorbing it pushes his body and Dou Qi to new levels.

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.description: With his strength returning, Xiao Yan heads to the Tager Desert to find his first Heavenly Flame, the Green Lotus Core Flame.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.description: In the desert, he meets his second brother, Xiao Li, and learns about the conflict between humans and the snake-people tribe over the flame.

episodes.title: Episode 9
episodes.description: Xiao Yan infiltrates the snake-people's territory and witnesses the terrifying power of their leader, Queen Medusa.

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.description: An unexpected encounter with Yun Yun, a powerful Dou Huang expert from the Misty Cloud Sect, leads to a temporary and complicated alliance.

episodes.title: Episode 11
episodes.description: Xiao Yan and Yun Yun battle a powerful Amethyst Winged Lion, and in the process, form a unique bond.

episodes.title: Episode 12
episodes.description: After parting ways with Yun Yun, Xiao Yan prepares for the next step of his plan: to seize the Heavenly Flame from Queen Medusa herself.
